title: Zero Sum Book One: Kotov Syndrome
description: Kotov Syndrome is the 1st book in the international bestselling Zero Sum serial trilogy of Wall Street thrillers. The story begins with Kotov Syndrome, & continues in Focal Point & Checkmate.- - -Wall Street.
